Stan Lee Commemorative Issue (2019)

All(*) theses issues feature:

  • A black band on the cover with the words "Stan Lee 1922 - 2018".
  • The inner front cover page is all black.
  • Followed by two more all black pages.
  • A sketch of Stan Lee by Phil Noto.
  • On the inner back cover is a reprint of the first "Stan's Soapbox".
  • The back cover is all black (except the price, rating and UPC box).

(*) A few of the issues do not have the black band on the cover, but still have the remaining features.

The Amazing Spider-Man (VIII) #12 (2019/02)
Black Panther vs. Deadpool #3 (2019/02)

Stomp Out Bullying Variant Cover (2014-2015)

Marvel and STOMP Out Bullying are proud partners in this anti-bullying and anti-cyberbullying campaign during National Bullying Prevention Month 2014. For more information on reducing and preventing bullying and cyberbullying, visit www.stompoutbullying.org or call 1-877-n0bully (1-877-602-8559).

Sturm und Drang: A Story of Love and War (2001)

The name of the storyarc is given as "Stürm und Drang", but "Sturm" is the correct German word.
